name: Transfer list
description: A transfer list or shuttle enables the user to move one or more list items between lists.

properties.name: listType
properties.label: List type
properties.handlerDescription: The List type property allows you to select the list type. The list type has two variants: basic and enhanced.

properties.name: leftItems
properties.label: Left items
properties.handlerDescription: Please enter the items to be displayed on the left in a comma in this field.

properties.name: rightItems
properties.label: Right items
properties.handlerDescription: Please enter the items to be displayed on the right in a comma in this field.
